item.title: A Semaphore Story
item.author: adas59@asu.edu (Amitabh Das)
item.description: In one of my recent interviews, I was asked this one problem based on semaphores which was quite challenging. I love interviews where I use the concepts I have learnt and need to derive the answer to a complex problem using the base concepts I know of. In this case, I had learnt about semaphores back in engineering and still remains one of my favorite OS concepts. The Situation So the interviewer asks “So, what’s your favorite restaurant?
